page.title: 20ENTERTAINMENT, RUGELEY
page.content:
Entertainment in Rugeley is varied and mainly home-made. Most youth clubs have been amalgamated into the Youth Centre which runs many activities. The Eaton Lodge Hotel runs discos and dances. Scout and Guide groups are thriving. A local operatic society has one production per year; other live theatre is found in neighbouring towns. There is a strong local history society and other special interest groups. There is no professional sport in Rugeley but there are clubs for all the main sports - football, cricket, hockey, rugby, cycling, snooker. The nearest public swimming pool is at Cannock but the small pool at Hagley school is open to the public for a limited time. All 3 school pools are used by clubs.
{ Survey by 1st Rugeley Scouts.
